text: TV Prijedor or Televizija Prijedor is a local Bosnian public television channel based in Prijedor municipality. It was established in 2000 as ТВ Приједор. Program is mainly produced in Serbian language from 18:00-24:00h. Radio Prijedor and local newspapers Kozarski Vjesnik are also part of public municipality services. == References == == External links == * Official website of TV Prijedor * Website of CRA BiH Category:Television channels and stations established in 2000 Category:Television stations in Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: TV Prijedor
